name: network-preflight
description: Azure DevOps extension that validates HTTP/DNS/TCP connectivity from pipeline agents before critical releases.
author: Azure DevOps Support

scripts.bundle: npx ncc build tasks/HttpCheckV1/index.js -o tasks/HttpCheckV1 && npx ncc build tasks/DnsLookupV1/index.js -o tasks/DnsLookupV1 && npx ncc build tasks/TcpProbeV1/index.js -o tasks/TcpProbeV1
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run bundle
scripts.validate: grep -Rni 'azure-pipelines-task-lib' tasks/*/index.js || echo 'âœ… No external requires found'
scripts.package: npm run build && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --rev-version
